channel.title: Divine Fate [Beta Mode]
channel.description:
[center][CENTER][img]http://divinefate-rsps.com/forums//images/dragonbyte_mmogaming/misc/vbulletin4_logo.png[/img][/center] [img]http://s4.postimage.org/31ieldkkk/webclient.png[/img][URL=http://"http://divinefate-rsps.com/forums/webclient.html"] [SIZE=3]Play Now![/SIZE][/URL] || [img]http://s4.postimage.org/31ieldkkk/webclient.png[/img][URL=http://"http://divinefate-rsps.com/downloads/DivineFate.jarl"] [SIZE=3]Download[/SIZE][/URL] || [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img] [URL=http://"http://divinefate-rsps.com"][SIZE=3]Forums[/SIZE][/URL]
[LEFT]We proudly present to this community, the Beta of Divine Fate! We are currently working on discovering and fixing bugs, and hereby open the Beta to the public.
The purpose of this Beta of Divine Fate, is to let players have a taste of what Divine Fate will be like and to seek out bugs, glitches, and improvements.
When you first log into the Beta, you will automatically receive a bank full of gear and supplies. You will also automatically have 75 in every skill. The reason is to accelerate and implement our purpose for opening beta, faster. You will not have to train as much, so it will save time.
At the end of the Beta, all accounts will be reset and we will soon update, and release the official version of Divine Fate
Benefits for beta testers have not been decided and we are currently taking in suggestions for them.[/LEFT]
[/CENTER] [SIZE=4][b]What is Divine Fate and What is our Main Focus?[/b][/SIZE]
Divine Fate is a brand new 317 RSPS that's main focus will be on Community. Here we strive to create a home for everyone and we'd like Divine Fate to be everyones final stay.
[SIZE=4][b]What does Community mean to us?[/b] [/SIZE] Community to us means family, clan, democracy, and basically keeping the players Entertained/Happy. Here on Divine Fate, all suggestions and decisions are brought to the players, everything said by a player is considered top priority. However, the staff are here to make the tough decisions, so dont complain if you didn't get what you wanted. We try our best to keep the all players happy.
[SIZE=4][b]Competitive[/b][/SIZE]
Competition? Ever played real easy Runescape Servers that got you maxed within an hour? You'll eventually get bored of it and what surprises me even more is that they have highscores on those servers. Here on Divine Fate, we offer a low, but not too low exp rate to increase competitivity. If a games not competitive why play it? It's one of the things that made Runescape players stick around Runescape. Ofcourse this doesn't mean our xp rates are gonna be like Runescape, we know the general population who are looking into RSPS's are basically looking for a chill community and an easy way out to spending loads of hours training a skill.
[b][u][SIZE=4]Bosses:[/SIZE][/u][/b]
- Corporeal Beast - Bork w/ Chaos Tunnels - Nex - God Wars - Dagonnoth Trio
[SIZE=4][b][u]Elite PvM:[/u][/b][/SIZE]
- Jadinkos - Ganodermic Beasts - Revenants - Tormented Demons - Glacor - Frost Dragons
[b][u][SIZE=4]Minigames:[/SIZE][/u][/b]
- Bounty Hunter - Warrior's Guild - Weapon Minigame (unfinished but playable) - Pest Control - Barrows - Fight Pits - Jad
[b][u][SIZE=4]Miscellaneous:[/SIZE][/u][/b]
- 508/525 Maps - 667 Items and 667 Animations - Skills Reworked: All skills fully functional - Fully Functional Summoning with Familiar special attacks, storage, and more! - Custom Dungeoneering with 5 floors, more to come! - Advanced Clan Chat, fully functional - Chaos Tunnels, leading to Bork - New Prestige System coming up very soon! - Summoning levels will not display in Wildy. (Picture #9)
[SIZE=4][u][b]Media:[/b][/u][/SIZE] [center]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NPKJEpW.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tbGr2WB.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5fpxJ4K.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2fgp9ch.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img580.imageshack.us/img580/203/wsnb.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/h3p0HVc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img541.imageshack.us/img541/6551/9rt.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/t01ePOB.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/3761/m8z.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgflip.com/2asr6.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgflip.com/2asza.gif[/img]
*Karma *Hunter *Leon/Loelue[/CENTER]

item.title: Divine Fate [Beta Mode]
item.dc:creator: @x_LoeLue_x x LoeLue x
item.description:
@x_LoeLue_x wrote:

Don’t forget we are in Beta Mode. We as the staff team, are committed to the players, and will be 24/7.

Read full topic

item.title: Divine Fate [Beta Mode]
item.dc:creator: @x_LoeLue_x x LoeLue x
item.description:
@x_LoeLue_x wrote:

[center][CENTER][/center]
[SIZE=3]Play Now![/SIZE] || [SIZE=3]Download[/SIZE] || [SIZE=3]Forums[/SIZE]

[LEFT]We proudly present to this community, the Beta of Divine Fate! We are currently working on discovering and fixing bugs, and hereby open the Beta to the public.

The purpose of this Beta of Divine Fate, is to let players have a taste of what Divine Fate will be like and to seek out bugs, glitches, and improvements.

When you first log into the Beta, you will automatically receive a bank full of gear and supplies. You will also automatically have 75 in every skill. The reason is to accelerate and implement our purpose for opening beta, faster. You will not have to train as much, so it will save time.

At the end of the Beta, all accounts will be reset and we will soon update, and release the official version of Divine Fate

Benefits for beta testers have not been decided and we are currently taking in suggestions for them.[/LEFT]

[/CENTER]
[SIZE=4]What is Divine Fate and What is our Main Focus?[/SIZE]

Divine Fate is a brand new 317 RSPS that’s main focus will be on Community. Here we strive to create a home for everyone and we’d like Divine Fate to be everyones final stay.

[SIZE=4]What does Community mean to us?
[/SIZE]
Community to us means family, clan, democracy, and basically keeping the players Entertained/Happy. Here on Divine Fate, all suggestions and decisions are brought to the players, everything said by a player is considered top priority. However, the staff are here to make the tough decisions, so dont complain if you didn’t get what you wanted. We try our best to keep the all players happy.

[SIZE=4]Competitive[/SIZE]

Competition? Ever played real easy Runescape Servers that got you maxed within an hour? You’ll eventually get bored of it and what surprises me even more is that they have highscores on those servers. Here on Divine Fate, we offer a low, but not too low exp rate to increase competitivity. If a games not competitive why play it? It’s one of the things that made Runescape players stick around Runescape. Ofcourse this doesn’t mean our xp rates are gonna be like Runescape, we know the general population who are looking into RSPS’s are basically looking for a chill community and an easy way out to spending loads of hours training a skill.

[SIZE=4]Bosses:[/SIZE]

  • Corporeal Beast
  • Bork w/ Chaos Tunnels
  • Nex
  • God Wars
  • Dagonnoth Trio

[SIZE=4]Elite PvM:[/SIZE]

  • Jadinkos
  • Ganodermic Beasts
  • Revenants
  • Tormented Demons
  • Glacor
  • Frost Dragons

[SIZE=4]Minigames:[/SIZE]

  • Bounty Hunter
  • Warrior’s Guild
  • Weapon Minigame (unfinished but playable)
  • Pest Control
  • Barrows
  • Fight Pits
  • Jad

[SIZE=4]Miscellaneous:[/SIZE]

  • 508/525 Maps
  • 667 Items and 667 Animations
  • Skills Reworked: All skills fully functional
  • Fully Functional Summoning with Familiar special attacks, storage, and more!
  • Custom Dungeoneering with 5 floors, more to come!
  • Advanced Clan Chat, fully functional
  • Chaos Tunnels, leading to Bork
  • New Prestige System coming up very soon!
  • Summoning levels will not display in Wildy. (Picture #9)
